statements: DELETE FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Complaint' AND interaction_time < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM customer_interactions WHERE conversation_text LIKE '%refund%' AND interaction_type = 'Support';
DELETE FROM customers WHERE name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM interactions WHERE interaction_id IN (SELECT interaction_id FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Email') AND date < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM customers c USING interactions i WHERE c.customer_id = i.customer_id AND i.date < '2023-01-01'
DELETE FROM Conversations WHERE conversation_date < '2021-01-01' AND conversation_notes LIKE '%complaint%';
DELETE FROM Responses WHERE response_date < '2021-01-01' AND response_message ILIKE '%urgent%'
DELETE FROM interactions WHERE customer_id = 123 AND interaction_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'complaint');
DELETE FROM conversations WHERE conversation_date > '2022-03-01' AND conversation_content LIKE '%resolved%';
DELETE FROM interactions WHERE customer_id = 123456 AND interaction_type = 'Email';
DELETE FROM conversations WHERE customer_id = 654321 AND conversation_date < '2022-01-01';
